name: h3
description: Introducing the 2025 DeMarini CF Drop 11 Fastpitch Softball Bat, a top-tier choice for players seeking a balanced swing feel. This bat is certified for USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC play, ensuring its versatility across leagues. It features a vibrant white, purple, and yellow colorway and a tracer end cap that enhances bat speed. Constructed with Paraflex Plus Composite, this bat delivers a massive sweet spot and responsiveness, while the Type V Connection Point reduces hand vibration and efficiently transfers energy to the barrel. With a 2 1/4 inch barrel diameter and a 0.800" handle designed to dampen vibrations, the DeMarini CF promises a superior hitting experience. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
